opportunity.title: Guide: Enabling Namada support for a new IBC token
opportunity.shortDescription: Champion the creation of a clear, concise guide to adding a new IBC token to Namada. This can be a first draft, it doesn't have to be exhaustive, and we can engage in this as a community. See here: https://forum.namada.net/t/guide-enabling-namada-support-for-a-new-ibc-token/1620
